#text=The last time I got a hair cut was a very long time ago .
#text=I needed to look presentable to see my distant family .
#text=I called up and made a reservation with the salon for four twenty five in the afternoon the next day .
#text=The next day I went in and they asked me about what sort of haircut I wanted .
#text=I did not really know exactly what I wanted so I let them just give me a simple , regular haircut .
#text=They started by washing my hair by dipping my head into a sink , massaging the soap in , and finally washing it out .
#text=Next they dried my hair a little bit , but left it damp so it would be easier for them to cut .
#text=Then they started cutting away using a combination of scissors and a razor .
#text=After about thirty minutes they asked me how I felt about my haircut , and since I approved , the cut was done .
